expertsAndSpeakers.AboutUsText: The Studen Association at the II Department and Clinic of Obstetrics and Gynaecology of the Medical University of Warsaw has been established in 1982. The association is lead by wonderful doctors, dr hab. Ewa Romejko-Wolniewicz and MD Agnieszka Dobrowowska-Redo. The meetings take place every two weeks at the Princess Anna Mazowiecka Hospital on Karowa St. in Warsaw. The issues discussed at the meetings definitely go beyond the knowledge provided to students during everyday classes at the university, at the same time not limited to the subject of gynaecology - internists, scientists, emergency medicine doctors and anesthesiologists have already given lectures.

mainPage.AboutConference: "Weekend with Gynecology - Secrets of Oncology" is an international student scientific conference organized by members of the Gynecology and Obstetrics Student Association of the Medical University of Warsaw. Interested in the subject of gynecological oncology, we decided to collect and present the latest reports in this field in an accessible form of lectures and workshops. Conference participants will be able to learn about the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of cancer affecting the female reproductive system. Working with the best specialists in Poland, we have developed a program of lectures related to the challenges facing modern gynecology. Additional interesting workshops, e.g. on surgical suturing or gynecological examination and breast examination, will be a unique opportunity to test your skills and acquire useful practical knowledge.
mainPage.AboutCompetition: Are you interested in the subject of gynecological oncology? Would you like to improve your public speaking skills? We have something for you! A unique competition organized as part of the 4th Weekend with Gynecology! Write a paper and win a one-week internship in Sweden! The motto of the competition is: "Unknown faces of cancer".
